paper_abstract: The paper develops a rational bi-cubic G(2) (curvature continuous) analogue of the non-uniform polynomial C-2 cubic B-spline paradigm. These rational splines can exactly reproduce parts of multiple basic shapes, such as cyclides and quadrics, in one by default smoothly-connected structure. The versatility of this new tool for processing exact geometry is illustrated by conceptual design from basic shapes.
paper_title: Rational bi-cubic G(2) splines for design with basic shapes
